channel.title: Please help I cant get 508 npcs to talk!
channel.description:
I use to know how to make 508 npcs talk to the players. But somehow while I was coding I ended up getting 100 errors; now everytime I assign that npc(s) to talk to players I continue getting 100 errors. Please help!
My server is to be updated soon... I would really apprciate any help.
